name: 3dExtractGroupInCorr
author: AFNI Developers
description: This program breaks the collection of images from a GroupInCorr file back into individual AFNI 3D+time datasets.

inputs.description: GroupInCorr file to extract datasets from (e.g. AAA.grpincorr.niml)
inputs.name: GroupInCorr File

inputs.description: Prefix to prepend to dataset labels. Use 'NULL' to skip the use of the prefix.
inputs.name: Prefix

output-files.description: Output dataset reconstructed from GroupInCorr data
output-files.name: Output Dataset
